header.punch-line: I build things for the web and love what I do

default.bio-end: I speak many languages but also JavaScript.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.intro: I started working with Embedded systems and programmed my first Robot in 2011. My professional career started in 2012 after completion of Bachelors in Computer Engineering degree. I always loved design + code but since I am not as close as a Designer (look at the design of this website) I became <1>Software Engineer</1>.
journey.body: I jump started my <0>Mobile Apps and Games developer</0> career in 2014 and till now I have developed more than 7+ cross platform educational games, 5+ cross platform mobile applications and helped in development of several other projects.
journey.conclusion: Now as <3>Principal Software Engineer</3>, I am responsible for cross team communication, mentoring, doing R&Ds, writing project requirement document (PRDs), libraries and frameworks.
